page.title: 10EDUCATION:PRIMARY Cont
page.content: where as 20 years ago, the timetable would have been rigid and lessons set for certain times. It was the an infant and Junior School combined. 20 years ago, everyone brought cold dinners to school or went home. Today 35 have school diners and 98 have their own packed lunch. Since 1980 when the Middle School opened, taking the older children, the age range has been from 4+ to 8+. The original School building was opened 1878.10 years ago another small block was built. School uniforms were once worn but are no longer considered to be compulsery. Other changes in the last 20 years have been the way classrooms are used, and the growth of ancilliary workers:3 supervisor /assistants,1 dinner lady 1 patrol crossing lady,1 cleaner/caretaker 1 secretary & 1 welfare assistant.
